item.title: home
item.description: A comprehensive public domain wiki for distributed systems knowledge, featuring explanations, research, code examples, and resources designed for both human and AI consumption

item.title: Creative Commons Legal Code
item.description: The laws of most jurisdictions throughout the world automatically conferexclusive Copyright and Related Rights (defined below) upon the creatorand subsequent owner(s) (each and all, an "owner") of an original work ofauthorship and/or a database (each, a "Work").

item.title: Index
item.description: A comprehensive guide to distributed systems fundamentals covering definitions, CAP theorem, architectures, core components, and key design considerations for building resilient and scalable systems
